eh_cutscene_free.notes:
- Fixed passenger skin color application issues.
- Fixed passenger hair style and color not applying correctly.
- Added face customization support (face blending).
- Added configuration guide with explanations for all options.
- Improved clothing system reliability.
- Updated component system for better compatibility.

eh_cutscene_paid.notes:
- Fixed passenger skin color application issues.
- Fixed passenger hair style and color not applying correctly.
- Added face customization support (face blending).
- Added configuration guide with explanations for all options.
- Improved clothing system reliability.
- Updated component system for better compatibility.

eh_antirelease_shield.notes: Optimized to support low-end PCs. Users with slower systems should no longer experience timeouts when joining the server.

raycrest_restaurant_job.notes: Fixed QBox player status not updating and consumable animation issues. Full update details available on our Discord: https://discord.gg/Eux7CJEQN2
